title: What is the interpretation of seeing stones in a dream and collecting stones and what does that mean?

preview.html: When seeing stones in a dream, stones in a dream have many connotations that can be related to good and evil. It indicates the marriage of a girl or a young man. A pregnant woman can indicate the birth of a son. Black stones indicate money, and red stones indicate the discovery of secrets. Scandals and precious stones testify to religiosity, good morals and a visit to the shrine. Seeing stones in a dream, and whoever sees himself throwing a stone at a person, this means a lack of religion and creating problems, and a red rock indicates scandals and the revelation of secrets. Interpretation of dreams about stones falling from a mountain. Seeing stones constantly falling from a mountain in a dream is a disturbing vision that indicates that the dreamer will face many... Problems and tribulations. Stones falling into the sea indicates that the fortuneteller will be exposed to material losses. Seeing stones in a dream or a goal that was not achieved, or a dream that was not fulfilled, or a wish that was not fulfilled by God. Interpretation of a dream about stones falling from the sky. Stones falling from the sky are dreams that spoil the meaning, and many sins. And disobedience. Seeing stones in a dream and dreaming that the earth has swallowed stones means illness or death in that place. Interpretation of a dream of a rock falling on a person. Rocks show a strong will and determination to achieve goals. To dream that you see a rock and hold it and see a stone grabbing it and holding it, this indicates piety, And good character, and enjoying good health and a long life. Seeing stones in a dream, and whoever sees himself throwing a stone at a person, this means a lack of religion and creating problems, and the red rock indicates scandals and the revelation of secrets. Interpretation of a dream about tayammum in a dream: And whoever sees a stone and performs tayammum with it, then this is good, and indicates To solve problems and troubles. And the end of worry and anxiety. Seeing stones in a dream, and whoever thinks that he is performing tayammum from a stone with water in it, this indicates his disobedience and sins. Interpretation of a dream about eating stones. Seeing stones in a dream. Eating stones in a dream is a strange vision and can lead the dreamer to be exposed to problems. And experiences and difficulties in his life. However, the dream indicates comfort after fatigue and that this ordeal will pass soon. Interpretation of a dream about stone carving: Seeing carvings on stones is a vision that shows kindness, hope, and optimism for tomorrow and a better future. Also, seeing stones in a dream indicates the death of fear. And exhaustion. Collecting stones in a dream. Accumulated stones may indicate the pilot’s exhaustion and fatigue. Collecting them can indicate protection, safety and removing fear. Seeing stones in a dream for an unmarried girl collecting stones may indicate that her marriage is approaching. Or she will face many difficulties and adversities. Collecting stones in a dream For a man, stones in a dream can have many connotations, such as disobedience, disobedience, and hardening of the heart. This vision in the dream of a young man or a married man indicates bad and harsh talk and that this person is rude and stubborn. If the dreamer is the one who throws stones at others, this indicates backbiting, gossiping, and slandering people. Seeing stones in a dream. As for the man’s interpretation of removing stones from the road, it indicates freedom from problems and problems

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction: One of the things that people often search for in the world of dream interpretation is a dream about tooth extraction, and this topic often appears in the vision. Sometimes you experience a tooth extraction and you feel disappointed and sad because you think about some bad situations happening in your life, so the interpretation of a dream about a tooth extraction is not good? We will learn about this in our article. Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction There are many concepts confirmed by dream experts about the interpretation of tooth extraction in a dream, and if it causes pain in sleep as a result of tooth decay, the interpretation is different from good tooth extraction, as well as the use of the hand. It may have a different meaning. Most jurists believe that the extraction of a latent tooth may indicate the occurrence of illness or severe anxiety for the dreamer, and if the tooth falls out and it is only one, this may be evidence of ease of financial circumstances. For the dreamer, salvation from a major debt in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that tooth extraction in a dream can be considered a good omen for the dreamer because it represents a long life, especially if the person does not feel any harm or pain in the dream. Unfortunately, the fall of many Teeth and a person’s intolerance to them is a bad thing in the world of dreams. The situation becomes more difficult if one cannot eat and the meaning warns that the viewer will lose his money and become poor. The dream interpretation website on the Internet is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Interpretation of Dreams Online in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth being extracted for a single woman: For a person, having a tooth extracted can be considered great evidence that he has fallen into depressing sadness with psychological instability at this stage of his life, and the crisis could be the result of his emotional relationship or his work. Removing a tooth for a girl can confirm her desire to separate from her fiancé and that she is looking for solace after that relationship that led her to exhaustion and going through many difficult events that she can no longer bear. Interpretation of a dream about removing a tooth for a married woman: When a married woman sees that she is removing her teeth, jurists expect that Bad things surround her relationship with her husband, as bad circumstances appear and cause a divorce between them, in addition to the many disagreements that she experienced in her life with him. As for the extraction of a rotten tooth in a woman’s eyes, it is good luck if sudden things happen to her, but she is full of success and happiness, and it may come to her personally or to someone from her family. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth being extracted for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman witnesses the extraction of many teeth inside her mouth, it is expected that Experts say that she is going through difficult days in reality, with increasing anxiety and tension controlling her thoughts and her desperate and bitter outlook on life. As for the appearance of only one tooth without the appearance of pain, it may be evidence of her married life full of goodness. The most important interpretations of a dream about extracting teeth. Interpretation of a dream about extracting a tooth by hand, from signs of extraction A tooth in the hand in a dream means that there is a person who does not cause comfort in the sleeping person in reality, but he will soon decide to move away and end this relationship unjustly.

title: Symptoms of expulsion of magic from the drink from the body and treatment of the patient

preview.html: Learn about the symptoms of magic coming out of the drink through a website in dreams. See all the signs of magic coming out of the stomach. Symptoms of magic medicine coming out: Vomiting is the first sign that magic has left the stomach and usually appears yellow, red, or black. Sometimes the dose may appear Magic in the stool, and the color of the stool may be somewhat dark. The appearance of diarrhea in the patient is also a sign of the expulsion of the magic drink from the body. Also, one of the symptoms of the expulsion of magic is the end of all the problems that the victim was facing. These symptoms often appear immediately after listening to the ruqyah. See also: Symptoms of touching during sleep Symptoms of magic disintegration Magic heroes with vinegar We have presented to you the signs of the magic medicine coming out, greetings from the site’s family in dreams.

title: Interpretation of a dream about building and construction for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about building and construction: In a dream for single and married women, Amar is the construction of buildings and houses for the purpose of housing and sheltering people and families. Many people see a building or building in a dream, and there are many interpretations and explanations about this vision. Interpretation of the dream of building and construction The interpretations came from a person’s vision of the building, that is, he builds and builds his house with his own hands in a dream. This refers to the decent life that a person enjoys in his life and lives a life full of kindness and kindness. Sustenance to live a decent life, and if a person sees that he is old and is praised for all his activity and effort, this is an indication of the lifestyle that he enjoys. He is building his grave and his death is approaching. Interpretation of Ammar’s dream. See also: Interpretation of the dream of drowning in the pond by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of Ibn Sirin building in a dream. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretations that seeing a building in a dream is a sign of a man’s marriage or entry into his wife, which will provide him with money, a child, and a life. Convenient, dignified, convenient and has many resources in front of him. Whoever benefits the dreamer in his life, the vision also indicates a blessed and wise person who resolves disputes between people in different ways. The dream of rebuilding and building for the sultans is a sign of mobilizing the army and crowds, preparing fateful plans and making urgent decisions. If one sees that he is starting to build and build, this symbolizes It indicates that the person having the vision will assume a high position and a high position or a wish will be fulfilled for him in the coming days. A building in a dream shows a person who seeks knowledge and travels for knowledge and shows that he has achieved his goals of obtaining a position or acquiring something. Seeing a person growing up while he is not... Likewise in a dream, this is a sign that he is wasting his time in life on useless things and allocating more to the soul than its capacity. If you see a building in a dream, this means bad health. An indication of one who follows the path of righteousness and follows the Sunnah of our Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. See also: Interpretation of a dream about having a close relationship with my beloved for a single man and a young man, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about making cement for a single woman. Interpretations differed regarding the unmarried man’s vision of building and construction in her dream. Many interpretations came from many interpretation scholars who mentioned this vision in a dream and the indicators of this vision in the individual’s reality and what are the connotations of this vision, and here are the most prominent interpretations that scholars mentioned about this vision for free. Interpretation of a dream about AmmarIf an unmarried girl sees that she is building a new house in her dream This is a sign of God’s blessing upon her for goodness and a lot of money. Also, if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is living in an old place, this is a sign that the girl will hear a lot of happy news that will rejoice the dreamer’s heart. If a girl dreams that she is building a house in A faraway place or in another country, this is evidence that an unmarried woman marries a man she does not know and immigrates with him to another country. Also, seeing an unmarried girl in her dream participating in rebuilding and building a new house, this is a sign of the lawful living that she seeks.

title: Interpretation of a dream that my brother is arguing with someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a brother arguing with someone in a dream In the following lines we will provide some interpretations, where you can find out what it means. Interpretation of a dream of a brother arguing with someone in a dream..Interpretation of a dream that my brother is arguing with someone in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of my brother arguing with someone in a dream. The dream did not find specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a quarrel between two mates in a dream could be a sign of severing the kinship connection, and God knows all that is not seen. If the dreamer sees an argument between two strangers, it may be a sign of competition, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a quarrel with His family in a dream, this may indicate difficulty, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my brother shaving his beard in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my brother shaving his beard in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this. title: Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Learn about the reasons for teeth falling out in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out causes insomnia for many people, as losing teeth causes terror and anxiety in the soul, and people do not believe that this vision can bring them good, so we will explain through our article what the interpretation of seeing teeth in A dream? What does its fall indicate? Seeing teeth in a dream expresses many things. It can be evidence that there is a secret and it is time to reveal it, or it can be a sign of the death of a relative or family member if the lower teeth fall out. In some visions and dreams, seeing teeth falling out is a good thing. It can be a sign of achieving ambitions, dreams, longevity, and a lot of money on the way to insight, in the event that the upper front teeth fall out. Seeing teeth falling out often is an expression of the psychological state that the viewer is experiencing, such as anxiety, depression, confusion, tension, fear, and others. Psychological disorders that surround people as a result of life pressures. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of teeth falling out If the dreamer sees that all his teeth are falling out in his lap, this is good news for the dreamer that he will live a long time until he thinks about all the people in his house and their number will increase before their eyes. If the dreamer sees In his dream, all his teeth fall out, but they disappear before his eyes. This means that he will lose his family while he is alive. Scientists say: The mouth is like a house, and the teeth are the inhabitants who live in it. Scientists divide the teeth of those who hold this opinion into two sides, the right side for men, and the left side for women. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out without blood. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out without blood, indicates the presence of problems and worries that the dreamer faces, and losing teeth in general indicates many difficulties and crises that the dreamer may face. Losing teeth can indicate the death of a relative or injury to a person. From illness, but if a pregnant woman sees that a tooth has fallen out, this means that she will give birth easily and smoothly. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian dream interpretation website. Interpretation of a dream of teeth falling out of the handIf one sees his teeth falling out of his hand, And his teeth were affected by decay, this indicates the presence of money from an illegal source. But if the dreamer sees his teeth white and falling into his hand, this is a sign that he will lose something and that God will compensate him with goodness. If a person sees his teeth in a dream white and clean and they fall into the palm of his hand, this indicates However, this person helps others with his money. If the dreamer sees in a dream that one of his teeth falls into his hand and is accompanied by blood, then this is good news for him that there is a woman preparing to give birth to her male child and the birth will be. It is easy and the child will be healthy, God willing. The interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in the hand of an unmarried girl is evidence that one of her family members will betray her and break up with him completely. But if a married woman sees that her teeth are falling out, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If a woman sees that His wife's teeth

Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of teeth falling out If the dreamer sees that all his teeth are falling out in his lap, this is good news for the dreamer that he will live a long time until he thinks about all the people in his house and their number will increase before their eyes. If the dreamer sees In his dream, all his teeth fall out, but they disappear before his eyes. This means that he will lose his family while he is alive. Scientists say: The mouth is like a house, and the teeth are the inhabitants who live in it. Scientists divide the teeth of those who hold this opinion into two sides, the right side for men, and the left side for women. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out without blood. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out without blood, indicates the presence of problems and worries that the dreamer faces, and losing teeth in general indicates many difficulties and crises that the dreamer may face. Losing teeth can indicate the death of a relative or injury to a person. From illness, but if a pregnant woman sees that a tooth has fallen out, this means that she will give birth easily and smoothly. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian dream interpretation website. Interpretation of a dream of teeth falling out of the handIf one sees his teeth falling out of his hand, And his teeth were affected by decay, this indicates the presence of money from an illegal source. But if the dreamer sees his teeth white and falling into his hand, this is a sign that he will lose something and that God will compensate him with goodness. If a person sees his teeth in a dream white and clean and they fall into the palm of his hand, this indicates However, this person helps others with his money. If the dreamer sees in a dream that one of his teeth falls into his hand and is accompanied by blood, then this is good news for him that there is a woman preparing to give birth to her male child and the birth will be. It is easy and the child will be healthy, God willing. The interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in the hand of an unmarried girl is evidence that one of her family members will betray her and break up with him completely. But if a married woman sees that her teeth are falling out, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If a woman sees that His wife's teeth

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about driving a car with someone I know

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with someone I know. Seeing riding a car in a dream is one of the common visions that many of us see in a dream, but the interpretation varies depending on the shape, color, and location of the car. Is it new or old? It can also be specialized specifically if the dreamer sees that he is driving with someone he knows, the vision has other meanings. The most important opinions of jurists and leading translators such as Ibn Sirin in this article. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with someone I know When interpreting a dream about driving a car with someone I know, scholars offer the following: Driving in a car with someone I know in a dream is a metaphor for a strong relationship, which could be a friendship Or marriage or work. Al-Nabulsi stated that the interpretation of a dream about driving in a luxurious black car with someone I know indicates that the dreamer will assume a position of influence and authority. Ibn Shaheen says: If a woman sees that she is riding in the car with one of her quarreling relatives, this is evidence of reconciliation and the restoration of family ties. Interpretation of the dream of driving a car with someone I know by Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of the dream of driving a car with someone I know, Ibn Sirin mentioned several interpretations, including: Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of an unmarried woman riding a car in the back seat as evidence of enjoying comfort and peace if she is riding with her father. It can be The interpretation of a dream about riding a car with someone I know for a man indicates entering into a business partnership or project together. A married woman is riding in a car with a friend in a dream and sitting in the back seat, blindly trusting her opinion and believing in the correctness of her decisions. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with someone I know about For single people, what is the interpretation of a dream about driving a car with someone I know for single people? Seeing an unmarried woman driving a car with someone she knows, and she was sitting in the back seat, indicates her submission to his control and control of her fateful decisions. The interpretation of a dream about driving a golden car with someone I know in the girl’s dream indicates Success in her studies or excellence in her professional life. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with someone I know for a married woman. We will discuss the most important interpretations of a dream about driving a car with a familiar face in a married woman’s dream as follows: Seeing a married woman driving a large and spacious car with her husband is good news, with a capacity for food and a lot of money. If she sees The wife is riding in the car with someone she knows, and it is dirty, so this is a sign of anxiety, problems, and a feeling of psychological pressure in her life. A woman who drives a green car in her sleep with her children is a good wife and a mother who raises her children according to the teachings of the Islamic religion. Driving in a narrow, old-fashioned car in a dream With her husband is a vision that indicates her poor financial circumstances and the hardships that affect her life. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with someone I know for a pregnant woman. Is a pregnant woman driving a car with someone she knows in a dream a vision that bodes well or portends evil? Seeing a pregnant woman driving an ambulance with her husband in a dream It symbolizes a caesarean section. If a pregnant woman sees that she is sitting in a car with one of her relatives and that they are walking on an arduous road, she may face some problems and difficulties in her birth.

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 12 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: The appearance of the number 12 in a dream indicates many things, and dream interpretation scholars have been able to provide clear explanations and evidence about the appearance of the number 12 in a dream for single and married women and men. Interpretation of seeing the number 12 in a dream Seeing the number 12 in a dream indicates many things, as the number 12 is the highest The clock, so the scorpion stands on it. It shows that the time is exactly without increasing or decreasing a minute, and thus shows the perfection of things and their progress to the fullest extent. If one sees the number 12 in his dream and it is very prominent in it, then this is what happens. This indicates that this person It will be a favor and a source for him in his life. This vision also shows him that he needs hard work and ingenuity to achieve everything that the visionary desires. Seeing the number 12 in a dream indicates a feeling of love with the number 2. It indicates coupling, while the number 1 indicates unity, Each of them has its own elements and vision. But adding the number 1 to 2 indicates the closeness that exists between friends and family. The number 12 in a dream is a strong indication that something awaits the dreamer. The number 12 in a dream indicates a relationship in which there is a person who is subject to the satisfaction of the other party. This is not a bad thing, but it shows the second person’s interest and love for the other person. Interpretation of dream number 12 for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees the number 12, this is a sign that she will be engaged soon if she was not engaged from the beginning. The number one in the number 12 indicates the unity and merging of this The girl and this is her complexion and happiness. A number in a single girl’s dream has a good message for that girl. There are many things that she will achieve in her next life by the command of God Almighty. Seeing the number 12 in a single woman’s dream may be from her subconscious. It indicates that she is feeling stressed because of her engagement. Her subconscious mind has emptied some stock in the form of a dream of hers, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams in LettersInterpretation of seeing the number 12 in a married woman’s dreamSeeing the number 12 in a married woman’s dream shows that she loves her husband very much and is very attached to him. The number 12 in a woman’s dream indicates The married woman indicates that there were a large number of crises and problems that this woman went through in her life. And that there was intense sadness that took over her for a long period of her life, but what comes next in her life will be instead of everything that she went through in her life. The number 12 in the dream indicates the end of a new year. In her life. Or it indicates the end of an hour in her life, and that hour will never return again. Also, seeing the number 12 in a dream shows her happiness with her children. And that these children will be a support for her life and strength after her death. The interpretation of seeing the number 12 in a man’s dream. Seeing the number 12 varies in... The dream, where it refers to all the religious matters that men do and remembers what was in the past. Knowing that the number 12 in the dream indicates that this person is close to God Almighty and that he is very attached to Him. If a man sees the number 12 in his dream, this is a vision. It denotes his waking consciousness that remembers the afterlife. What about bliss and terror and must you continue on the path A

title: Interpretation of seeing a husband beating his wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a husband beating in a dream indicates that he will benefit from it, and there is much evidence that hitting a husband in a dream depends on the nature of each person. Interpretation of seeing a husband hitting in a dream If the wife sees that she is hitting the husband, this indicates that she has paid all his debts or that there is someone to help him. Financially. But if he sees that she is beating him severely, then it has shown him that the husband will deprive his wife of her wisdom and advice. Interpretation of seeing a husband beating a single girl in a dream: The dream of an unmarried girl beating her husband indicates that this husband will obtain a benefit from his wife. The dream indicates The dream of an unmarried girl hitting her husband with a knife indicates that the girl has fallen into a conspiracy and is deceived by someone. The dream of an unmarried girl hitting her friend’s husband with his wife indicates that It helps the girl overcome her problems. Interpretation of seeing a husband hitting a pregnant woman in a dream: A dream about a pregnant woman beating her husband indicates that the pregnant woman will benefit from it. A dream about a pregnant woman hitting her husband and screaming at him indicates her need for help in getting pregnant. If she sees a pregnant woman hitting her husband after he Hitting her indicates that she failed to give birth. If we dream of a pregnant woman beating her husband and getting a divorce in a dream, this shows a difference between them. A pregnant woman’s dream of beating her husband to death indicates that she bears full responsibility and bears responsibility. A pregnant woman’s dream of violently beating her husband indicates To the intense love between them. You may also be interested in: Beating a dog in a dream and killing it, and its interpretation by the senior imams of dream interpretation. Interpretation of seeing a husband beaten in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her husband wounded by a bullet in his head, this indicates that bad things were said about him. If a woman dreams If a married woman sees in her dream that she is hitting her husband with a bullet behind his back, this means that she insulted him with obscene words. If a married woman sees her husband hitting her brother, this indicates the dreamer’s need. For justice from her brother with her husband. A married woman’s dream of beating her husband and leaving him indicates that the wife abandoned her husband in his trial and did not stand by his side. A married woman’s dream of beating her husband in front of people she does not know indicates revealing things and secrets that her husband is hiding from her. A married woman’s dream of beating her husband In front of someone you know indicates that there are disagreements between them that may lead to separation. Seeing a dead husband beating her If a woman is seen beating her dead husband, she is told that the wife will receive her inheritance or benefit from it. If a woman sees herself beating her dead husband, this indicates that she is in dire need of him. And she cannot bear her responsibilities alone. With this we have finished providing the interpretation of seeing a husband beating in a dream for unmarried, pregnant and married women. Read also: Interpretation of seeing demonstrations in a dream and participating in them by Ibn Sirin. Dream interpretation service within 24

title: Interpretation of a dream about an officer in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about an officer or a policeman has many interpretations and interpretations, and the policeman has a role in our lives that works to protect us from any harm or evil. Today, in our article, we will learn about the interpretation of the officer in the dream and everything related to it for the unmarried girl and the married woman, for the man and the young man in the dream, and here are the most important details about Encyclopedia.Interpretation of a dream about an officer in a single woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl dreams in a dream that there is an officer arresting her, then this is good and blessed evidence and shows that the dreamer will give her a man of morals and religion and will be in a great position of knowledge and that he will lead her to the highest positions. If it is a girl An unmarried woman dreams of an officer, this indicates that the dreamer has abundant livelihood and that God will soon honor her with marriage and that he will provide for her and make her feel comfortable and safe with him. If a girl sees in a dream that officers entered her house, this is undesirable, it means that some problems and obstacles will appear in the The dreamer's life, and God knows best. If a girl sees in a dream that the police have arrested and detained her, this is evidence that some problems will arise for the dreamer, but God will save her from them and God will bless her with great joy. And God knows best. Interpretation of an officer in a dream for a married woman: The officer in a married woman’s dream has many indicators that indicate that the dreamer will give her great happiness from him. This indicates that her husband loves her very much and that she will reach a great position in his work and fulfill all his wishes in the field of work and life. She saw the officers in her dream, this indicates that there are those who want to harm the person who had the vision and harm her, but God will reveal it to her so that she will know her enemies. And whoever sees in her dream that the oppressed person enters her house, this indicates that the dreamer will face some problems with her husband and his family. And if the officers leave the house, this indicates However, these problems will be resolved peacefully and that happiness will prevail in the house again, and God knows best. Interpretation of officers in a dream for a man: Officers or police officers in a dream for a man or a young man, indicates great benefit to the dreamer and that God will give him a good job that will earn him a lot of money. The dream indicates blessings, food, and kindness for the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that the officers are arresting the dreamer and escaping from them, this indicates that there are some problems and obstacles, but they will end and be solved, God willing. The officers in the man’s dream indicate that the dreamer is a strong man with a beautiful personality and fears God in All his deeds. Whoever sees in his dream that the officer greets him and greets him, this is evidence of great goodness for the dreamer and that happiness dominates his entire life (and God knows best). The officers in the dream indicate kindness, sustenance, and life between the spouses with kindness and happiness. Interpretation of the officer in a pregnant woman’s dream: The officer in A pregnant woman's dream has more than one meaning. This indicates that the woman in the dream is close to the scheduled date of giving birth. It appears that the woman in the dream will give birth to a beautiful and healthy child (and God knows best). If the pregnant woman dreams that the police arrest her in the dream, then this dream is evidence that the dreamer is suffering from severe fear and tension during the birth stage.
